## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Oil Extraction System at (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) - extracts crude oil (currently without power)
- Storage tank at (22.5, 40.5) - stores extracted crude oil
- Pipe network connecting pumpjack to storage tank (positions: (19.5,38.5), (18.5,38.5), (21.5,38.5), (20.5,38.5))

### Partial Power Plant at (-8.5, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-8.5, 20.0) - now operational with coal fuel and water connection
- Offshore pump at (-11.5, 21.5) - connected to boiler via pipe network
- Pipe network connecting water source to boiler (positions: (-6.5,21.5), (-6.5,20.5), (-11.5,22.5), (-8.5,22.5), (-7.5,22.5), (-6.5,22.5))

### Secondary Boiler at (27.5, 41.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (27.5, 41.0) - currently non-functional (missing fuel and water input)

### Coal Mining Operation at (16.0, 21.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (16.0, 21.0) - extracting coal
- Wooden chest at (16.5, 23.5) - coal storage
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 22.5) - transfers coal from drill to chest

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement distance errors (recurring)
- Entities must be placed within 10 tiles of player position (occurred 4 more times)
- When working with distant systems, plan movement between sites carefully

### Obstruction errors (recurring)
- Cannot place entities where pipes or other objects exist (occurred 3 more times)
- Steam engines cannot be placed on water (occurred 1 more time)
- Chest placement requires 1 empty tile around target position (occurred 2 more times)

### Power plant construction (new)
- Steam engine placement failed due to water obstruction - verify terrain heightmap before placement
- Secondary boiler at (27.5,41.0) remains non-functional due to missing water connection

### Inventory management (new)
- Attempted to place boiler when none were in inventory (step 17) - always verify inventory before placement
- Failed to insert coal into pumpjack - pumpjacks require electricity, not direct fuel insertion

### System connectivity (recurring)
- Pumpjack still lacks power connection - prioritize completing power plant
- Verify all fluid connections when entities show "no fluid present" warnings

### General tips (updated)
- When crafting components (like boilers), verify successful crafting in inventory
- For complex placements, check all surrounding tiles for obstructions including water
- Complete one system (power plant) before moving to secondary projects
- Verify entity power requirements (pumpjacks need electricity, not fuel)
